question_text: Did the company hold any general dancer auditions for the upcoming season during this reporting month?
If not, explain.
How many dancers auditioned?
From which regions or countries did most auditioning dancers come  and were any international auditions or competitions used as recruitment channels?
How many company contracts (including apprentices/trainees) did we intend to offer this month through recruitment activities?
How many company contracts (including apprentices/trainees) did we actually offer this month through recruitment activities (compared to the target above)?
From which regions or countries did those dancers offered contracts come?
The Subscription revenue budget in Calgary was $1,186,260; what is the total subscription revenue for Calgary YTD?
What is the explanation for Calgary variances (subscription revenue, number of accounts, seats per account, average ticket price)?
The Subscription revenue budget in Edmonton was $517,200; what is the total subscription revenue for Edmonton YTD?
What is the explanation for Edmonton variances (subscription revenue, number of accounts, seats per account, average ticket price)?
Live Music
Although we did not have a budget for Live Music donations this year, have we secured any donations for Live Music YTD?
What is the explanation for the Live Music variance from budget this year?
New Works
Although we did not have a budget for New Works donations this year, have we secured any donations for New Works YTD?
What is the explanation for the New Works variance from budget this year?
Costume Campaign
The donation budget for the Costume Campaign was $350,000 this year; how much money have we secured for Costume Campaign YTD?
What is the explanation for the Costume Campaign variance from budget this year?
Provincial Touring

Dance Circle
The budget for Dance Circle in Calgary was $171,000 this year; how much money have we secured for Dance Circle YTD in Calgary?
What is the explanation for the Dance Circle Calgary variance from budget this year?
The budget for Dance Circle in Edmonton was $54,000 this year; how much money have we secured for Dance Circle YTD in Edmonton?
What is the explanation for the Dance Circle Edmonton variance from budget this year?
Sponsorship
The sponsorship budget this year was $57,000; how much money have we secured for Sponsorship YTD (excluding sponsor-paid tickets)?
What is the explanation for the Sponsorship variance from budget this year?
Canada Council
The Canada Council budget this year was $622,685; how much money have we secured from Canada Council YTD?
What is the explanation for the Canada Council variance from budget this year?
Federal Project Grants
Although there was no budget for Federal Project Grants this year, have we secured any funding in Federal Project Grants YTD?
What is the explanation for the Federal Project Grants  variance from budget this year?
Provincial Project Grants
Although there was no budget for Provincial Project Grants this year, have we secured any funding in Provincial Project Grants YTD?
What is the explanation for the Provincial Project Grants  variance from budget this year?
Muncipal Project Grants - Calgary
Although there was no budget for Municipal Project Grants in Calgary this year, have we secured any funding in Municipal Project Grants in Calgary YTD?
What is the explanation for the Municipal Project Grants  in Calgary variance from budget this year?
Muncipal Project Grants - Edmonton
Although there was no budget for Municipal Project Grants in Edmonton this year, have we secured any funding in Municipal Project Grants in Edmonton YTD?
What is the explanation for the Municipal Project Grants  in Edmonton variance from budget this year?
Foundatios
The budget for foundations this year was $300,000;  how much money have we secured for foundations YTD (excluding Alberta Ballet Foundation)?
What is the explanation for the foundations variance from budget this year?
Festivals and Touring
What was the name of the festival or tour?
Where was it held (cities, countries)?
How many performances did we do?
How many audience members were in attendance per performance?
Briefly note any notable media coverage or donor/stakeholder events linked to this festival (type and scale, not a full list).
Special Events
What was the name of the special event?
Where was it held and who was the host?
How many performances did we do?
How many audience members were in attendance per performance?
Briefly note any notable media coverage or donor/stakeholder events linked to this event (type and scale, not a full list).
What artistic and public purpose did this production serve within Alberta Ballet�s strategic priorities?
In what ways did the production intentionally engage or choose not to engage with social or community themes, and why?
How did this production contribute to the development, visibility, or employment of Alberta-based artists?
If Alberta-based artists were not meaningfully engaged, what strategic, artistic, or practical considerations informed that decision?
What elements of this production most clearly advanced Alberta Ballet�s artistic distinctiveness or creative evolution?
How would you assess this production�s level of innovation relative to recent Alberta Ballet work, and what were the most significant innovations?
What long-term value did this production create beyond performances, including reusable assets, skills, processes, or partnerships?
Did any artistic or production choices improve organisational efficiency, capability, or resilience, or why was this not a priority?
How did external collaborations or residencies strengthen this production artistically or strategically?
If external collaborations or residencies were limited or absent, what strategic or artistic rationale guided that choice?
